Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
